apis.name: Feature Flags API
apis.description: Users with Developer or higher permissions can access Feature Flag API.

apis.name: Feature Flags pagination
apis.description: By default, GET requests return 20 results at a time because the API results are paginated.

apis.name: List feature flags for a project
apis.description: Gets all feature flags of the requested project.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: scope
attributes.description: The condition of feature flags, one of: enabled, disabled.

response.name: merge_train
response.description: This feature is about merge train

response.name: new_live_trace
response.description: This is a new live trace feature

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: feature_flag_name
attributes.description: The name of the feature flag.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the feature flag.

attributes.name: version
attributes.description: The version of the feature flag. Must be new_version_flag. Omit or set to legacy_flag to create a Legacy Feature Flag.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The description of the feature flag.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: The active state of the flag. Defaults to true. Supported in GitLab 13.3 and later.

attributes.name: strategies
attributes.description: The feature flag strategies.

attributes.name: strategies:name
attributes.description: The strategy name. Can be default, gradualRolloutUserId, userWithId, or gitlabUserList. In GitLab 13.5 and later, can be flexibleRollout.

attributes.name: strategies:parameters
attributes.description: The strategy parameters.

attributes.name: strategies:scopes
attributes.description: The scopes for the strategy.

attributes.name: strategies:scopes:environment_scope
attributes.description: The environment spec for the scope.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: feature_flag_name
attributes.description: The current name of the feature flag.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: The description of the feature flag.

attributes.name: active
attributes.description: The active state of the flag. Supported in GitLab 13.3 and later.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The new name of the feature flag. Supported in GitLab 13.3 and later.

attributes.name: strategies
attributes.description: The feature flag strategies.

attributes.name: strategies:id
attributes.description: The feature flag strategy ID.

attributes.name: strategies:name
attributes.description: The strategy name.

attributes.name: strategies:parameters
attributes.description: The strategy parameters.

attributes.name: strategies:scopes
attributes.description: The scopes for the strategy.

attributes.name: strategies:scopes:id
attributes.description: The scopes ID.

attributes.name: strategies:scopes:environment_scope
attributes.description: The environment spec for the scope.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

attributes.name: feature_flag_name
attributes.description: The name of the feature flag.
